verses.verse: Thus the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> <S%H3335>me:<s%> and behold, he formed <S%H1462>locusts<s%> in the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of the shooting <S%H5927>up<s%> of the latter <S%H3954>growth;<s%> and <S%H3954>behold,<s%> it was the latter growth <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H1488>harvest.<s%>

It happened <S%H3615>that,<s%> when they made an end of <S%H398>eating<s%> the <S%H6212>grass<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> then I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H136>"Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5545>forgive,<s%> I beg <S%H3290>you!<s%> How could Jacob <S%H6965>stand?<s%> For he is <S%H6996>small.<s%>"

Thus the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7200>showed<s%> me and <S%H136>behold,<s%> the Lord <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H7378>judgment<s%> by <S%H784>fire;<s%> and it <S%H398>dried<s%> up the <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H8415>deep,<s%> and would have <S%H398>devoured<s%> the <S%H2506>land.<s%>
Then I <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H136>"Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H2308>stop,<s%> I beg <S%H3290>you!<s%> How could Jacob <S%H6965>stand?<s%> For he is <S%H6996>small.<s%>"
<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5162>relented<s%> concerning <S%H559>this.<s%> "This also shall not be," says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>
Thus he <S%H7200>showed<s%> me and <S%H136>behold,<s%> the Lord <S%H5324>stood<s%> beside a <S%H2346>wall<s%> made by a plumb <S%H594>line,<s%> with a plumb <S%H594>line<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5986>me,<s%> "370, what do you <S%H7200>see?<s%>" I <S%H559>said,<s%> "A plumb <S%H594>line.<s%>" Then the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7760>"Behold,<s%> I will set a plumb <S%H594>line<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> I will not <S%H3254>again<s%> pass by them any <S%H5674>more.<s%>

The high <S%H1116>places<s%> of <S%H3446>Isaac<s%> will be <S%H8074>desolate,<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuaries<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be laid <S%H2717>waste;<s%> and I will <S%H6965>rise<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>"

Then <S%H558>Amaziah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H5986>"370<s%> has <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against you in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%> The <S%H776>land<s%> is not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H3557>bear<s%> all his <S%H1697>words.<s%>

For <S%H5986>Amos<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H3379><s%> 'Jeroboam will <S%H4191>die<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H1540>surely<s%> be led away <S%H1540>captive<s%> out of his <S%H127>land.<s%>'"

<S%H558>Amaziah<s%> also <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5986>Amos,<s%> "You <S%H2374>seer,<s%> <S%H3212>go,<s%> flee <S%H1272>away<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and there <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and prophesy <S%H5012>there:<s%>
but <S%H5012>don't<s%> prophesy <S%H3254>again<s%> any more at <S%H1008>Bethel;<s%> for it is the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> and it is a <S%H4467>royal<s%> <S%H1004>house!<s%>"

Then <S%H5986>Amos<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> <S%H558>Amaziah,<s%> "I was no <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> neither was I a <S%H5030>prophet<s%>'s <S%H1121>son;<s%> but I was a <S%H951>herdsman,<s%> and a <S%H1103>farmer<s%> of sycamore <S%H8256>figs;<s%>

and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> me from <S%H310>following<s%> the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> and <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3212>me,<s%> 'Go, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> to my <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'

Now therefore <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'You say, <S%H5012>Don't<s%> prophesy against <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H5197>don't<s%> preach against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3446>Isaac.<s%>'

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H802><s%> 'Your wife shall be a <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> in the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and your <S%H1323>daughters<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and your <S%H127>land<s%> shall be <S%H2505>divided<s%> by <S%H2256>line;<s%> and you yourself shall <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> a <S%H127>land<s%> that is <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H1540>surely<s%> be led away <S%H1540>captive<s%> out of his <S%H127>land.<s%>'"
